Control Name: Defines Characteristics of Processing Inputs—The characteristics of processing inputs that are necessary to meet requirements are defined.

control_attributes.Control: Defines Characteristics of Processing Inputs—The characteristics of processing inputs that are necessary to meet requirements are defined.
control_attributes.SubCategory:
PI1.2 The entity implements policies and procedures over system inputs, including controls over completeness and accuracy, to result in products, services, and reporting to meet the
entity’s objectives.
